title: Were most of Disney's hit movies based on ancient Fairy Tales?
description:
What makes a story a Fairy Tale? How did two brothers create 100's of Fairy Tales? Did people once believe in Witches, Fairies and Giant Ogres? For free home activities sign-up at www.WhoSmarted.com
